description: The trail is groomed as a double track and it winds,dips & climbs a slight ridge through Scrub Oak and Aspen to the Overlook, and then circles back to the parking lot.  Reletively easy ski, and at the halfway is a choice to ski down a hill, or use the novice track around the hill.
directions: Trail head is Located next to the riding stable in Birdshill Park, 15km north on hwy 59 from the north perimeter.  Once in the park take the north drive and follow the signs to the riding stable parking lot.
title: Esker
